ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Quests with KOS faction
ygData.msgSnippet: As a 41 Bard I have successfully charmed Sentry Kale to do the Hammerfal quest. The Charismatic Carrilion doesnt bring the giants anymore than threateningly to
ygData.messageBody:
As a 41 Bard I have successfully charmed Sentry Kale to do the Hammerfal
quest. The Charismatic Carrilion doesnt bring the giants anymore than
threateningly to dubious. However I've noticed that only the giants that are
on Kromrif faction are still KOS to me. All the Kromzek are Amiable. I've
fought in SS for quite a while and I still have yet to raise my Kromrif
faction. I think that one of the best ways to do this would be the Coldain
heads to the Kromrif Recruiter, or do the Mercenary supplies quest a couple
times.

Arud Bastad
41st Level Sngstacker

-----Original Message-----
From:
sentto-160851-24619-988350760-matosvr=theriver.com@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-24619-988350760-matosvr=theriver.com@....c
om]On Behalf Of Bill Costlow
Sent: Thursday, April 26, 2001 10:53 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Quests with KOS faction



Kael is a tough zone. As a 39 bard I've found that charasmatic Carrilion
has limited effect for me and sneak is the way to go if your faction is low
and you need something. The good quests are all in King Tormax's area and
you can't get thru there with invis song -- you may be able to sneak but one
of the "features" of Kael is that anyone dragging a body is KOS, regardless
of faction so plan for a difficult CR if things go badly.
If you are going thru Kael using sonorous clouding, be sure to con giants
at regular intervals. If any of them see thru the song, you are likely
close to the temple of Rallos Zek, a very bad place to be, even if you are
agnostic -- all bards are KOS there.
John Grady <john_grady@...> wrote:
Has anyone successfully charm/sneak/invis their way in to some Kael or SS
armor? I'm thinking of trying the Iceshackles and Dragon Tooth quests even
though I'm KOS and would love some experienced advice - and hope that
someday I can get the SS armor if I get the gems.

Tzeetch

--- "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
wrote:
